Detailed Description

template<class Type>
class stHugeGenericMatrix< Type >

This class template implements is a variant of stGenericMatrix which is able to store a very large matrix.

Author
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino.nosp@m.@icm.nosp@m.c.usp.nosp@m..br)
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)
Version
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class Type >
stHugeGenericMatrix< Type >::stHugeGenericMatrix ( )
inline

Creates a new Matrix with 0 cols and 0 rows. Use SetSize() to change the size of this matrix.
